## FoundryVTT Installation

To install this module in FoundryVTT:

1. Open FoundryVTT and navigate to **Add-on Modules**
2. Click **Install Module**
3. Paste this manifest URL: `https://github.com/laurigates/foundryvtt-webrtc-mediasoup/releases/latest/download/module.json`
4. Click **Install**

Alternatively, download the latest release and extract it to your FoundryVTT modules directory.
